title: Exhibition on Screen 4of4 Vincent van Gogh PDTV x264 AAC MVGroup
description:
Exhibition on Screen

Arts Documentary hosted by Phil Grabsky, published by BSkyB in 2014 - English narration. 
http://docuwiki.net/images/5/5e/Exhibition-on-Screen-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------
Filmed for cinema at the world's biggest art exhibitions and on location, this ground breaking series allows art lovers worldwide to enjoy, marvel and delight at the works of some of history's greatest ever painters.

1)  Girl with a Pearl Earring 
Explores the story behind Johannes Vermeer's 17th century painting, Girl with a Pearl Earring.

2)  Rembrandt 
National Gallery, London, and The Rijksmuseum, Amsterdam: Film exploring Rembrandt's key works in exhibitions in both London and Amsterdam.

3)  The Impressionists 
Du Luxembourg and Orsay, Paris, the National Gallery London and Philadelphia Museum of Art: A fascinating look at art's greatest revolutionaries, such as Monet, Cezanne, Degas and Renoir.

4)  Vincent van Gogh 
Curators and art historians give eye-opening interpretations and explanations of van Gogh's work at Amsterdam's Van Gogh Museum.
